member.name: ICancelMethodCalls.Cancel
member.summary: Requests that a method call be canceled.
member.param: The number of seconds to wait for the server to complete the outbound call after the client requests cancellation.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Call cancellation is not enabled on the thread that is processing the call.
The call was completed during the timeout interval.

member.name: ICancelMethodCalls.TestCancel
member.summary: Determines whether a call has been canceled.
member.returns: If the call was canceled, the return value is RPC_E_CALL_CANCELED. Otherwise, it is RPC_S_CALLPENDING.

member.name: ICancelMethodCalls
member.summary: Manages cancellation requests on an outbound method call and monitors the current state of that method call on the server thread.
